quiz.question: Go to File
quiz.note: Jump to a specific file in your workspace

quiz.question: Go to Line
quiz.note: Jump to a specific line in the current file

quiz.question: Go to Symbol in File
quiz.note: Navigate to a specific symbol (like a function or variable) in the current file

quiz.question: Go to Symbol in Workspace
quiz.note: Navigate to a specific symbol in the entire workspace

quiz.question: Go to Definition
quiz.note: Navigate to the definition of the symbol under the cursor

quiz.question: Go Back / Go Forward
quiz.note: Navigate back or forward in the editor history

quiz.question: Switch Editor
quiz.note: Switch between open files in the order they were last accessed

quiz.question: Next Error or Warning
quiz.note: Navigate to the next error or warning in the file

quiz.question: Previous Error or Warning
quiz.note: Navigate to the previous error or warning in the file

quiz.question: Reveal Active File in Side Bar
quiz.note: Highlight the currently active file in the Explorer pane
